mapper.insert: insert into StaffInfoInCompany(staffNumber, departmentId, staffGrade, workType, hiredate, currentWorkStatus) values (#{staffNumber}, #{departmentId}, #{staffGrade}, #{workType}, #{hiredate}, #{currentWorkStatus})
mapper.select: select id, staffNumber, departmentId, staffGrade, workType, hiredate, currentWorkStatus from StaffInfoInCompany where id = #{id}
